_sText:
ze_shroomforest3

The sequel to Shroomforest2, that conclude the story (or does it?)



Feature

  • 19 Special Items (1 zombie item)
  • Musics
  • Packed Entwatch config
  • 7 Levels 
  • custom_particle nomenclature
  • 15 Minutes round


Changelog b6.1-->b6.2

 

---------------
++ Changelog ++
---------------

• General:	Removed the spawnpoint located in Pokemon World
			Added Unloze and GFLClan.ru to credits (message and credits texture)

• Level2:	Skeleton will attack with bones every 12 seconds (3-5 sec in Extreme2)
			Each Skeleton has less HP per player (100 -> 90)

• Level3:	Fixed Ghastly spawning at the wrong location (in the void)
			Hopefully fixed Snorlax Attack during Extreme3 (slow ct)
			Grenades do 40 damage to Snorlax instead of 35
			Snorlax has less HP per player (375 -> 350)
			
• Ext3:		Added clip to prevent player getting stuck on rocks

• TimeLoop:	Added a Teleport for Zombie in front of the clock (enabled 3 seconds after the CT one)
			Falling off the table teleport on the book
			Added clip to prevent player to jump down before the 1st boss 
			Reduced the Tanks cannon ball damage (250 -> 200)
			Increased the delay before the ground move down (1.4 s -> 2 s)
			When boss die, the clip blocking the next part is killed once the cutscene is done
			Reduced the HP for Satan per player (400 -> 300)
			Fixed the 'Satan Absorb Nades' message to show 4 time instead of once
			Fixed Satan Ice attack keeping player froze after boss fight
			Filtered the teleport in cage to the power room to Zombie Only
			Added more HP for Laser Satan per player (60 -> 75)
			Increased the time you have to beat him (30 s -> 40 s)
			The clip preventing knife into laser area teleport out player getting stuck
			1000 points for winning the Good Ending only (500 with TimeLoop ending)
			Player become grey / black and white while in the Old shroomforest area

• Bonus:	Fixed the teleport particle staying when a player is in admin room
			Delayed the teleport enable to prevent a CT from becoming Zombie after taking it


ze_shroomforest_v4_5: http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/186471

ze_shroomforest2_v1: http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/186967
